title: P22 and IHOF release Festiva
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131757/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 4.May.2009 2.57pm 

For Immediate Release  
Buffalo, NY- May 4th, 2009

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FestivaFlag_5705.gif)

P22 and the International House of Fonts proudly announce Festiva- the  
latest font designed by Terry Wudenbachs for the IHOF Collection.

P22 Festiva is based on lettering found on a 1960s kitchen appliance  
catalog. It evokes 1960s TV and pop culture while still having a  
contemporary feel. The fun exuberant flavor of this face is perfect for  
parties and celebrations. The letters dance across the baseline and the  
lower case wants to be an upper case but just canâ€™t quite make it. P22  
Festiva Regular includes a full unicode European Character set (Western,  
CE, Turkish, Romanian etc).

Introductory offer through May.
